content.rendered:
iSES 2019 will be held in Rourkela, India.

Conference Venue

National Institute of Technology Rourkela, Odisha, India, 769008

Website: www.nitrkl.ac.in

How to Reach

Rourkela is the second largest Urban city of the state of Odisha, India. The city has been selected as a smart city and is famous for the largest steel plants of the Steel Authority of India Limited (SAIL) known as Rourkela Steel Plant. It also has one of the National Institutes of Technology (NIT Rourkela) of the country, which will be hosting iSES 2019.

By Air:

There is no commercial airstrip in Rourkela; however, Steel Authority of India Limited has an airport that is routinely used for charter flights and private aircraft. Major airports in the proximity of Rourkela are Ranchi, Bhubaneswar, Kolkata, and Raipur as per details are given below:

 

Airport Rail distance from
Rourkela, journey time		 Road distance from
Rourkela, journey time		 Remarks
Kolkata 413 km, 6 hrs 525 km, 9 hrs International flights, all major cities of India connected
Jharsuguda 101km, 1 hr 45mins 131km, 2 hr 40 mins New airport, currently flights to New Delhi only
Ranchi 166 km, 3 hrs 222 km, 4 hrs Some cities of India are connected
Bhubaneswar 462 km, 6 hrs 320 km, 5 hrs All major cities of India connected
Raipur 417 km, 6 hr 30 mins 448, 6 hrs 30 mins Some cities of India are connected

By Train:

Rourkela is well connected by train routs with all parts of the country. It is situated on the Howrah-Mumbai line and as well as on Ranchi-Bhubaneswar line.

By Road:

Rourkela is connected to various towns of the state by State Highway no 10 and National Highway no. 23. Thus it is also connected with cities like Ranchi, Raipur, Sambalpur, etc. Several buses ply between Rourkela and the major cities of the state like Bhubaneswar, Puri, Sambalpur, etc.

How to Reach NIT

Rourkela railway station is situated 7 km away from the NIT campus. Autos/private taxis/ OLA are available round the clock there. Local transport facility is also available from nearby state and private bus terminus. Official guests are normally received at the railway station.

 

Google MAP Link: https://www.google.com/maps/d/viewer?mid=1nUbNyuMn1ltzx9wyb-r-4EeQerA&ll=22.251794993269694%2C84.89901266772426&z=17
